about_the_game:
Adventure Field™ 5 Adventurer Bundle includes :


  • The Adventurer Bundle in-game item that give the player : The exclusive Fancy Suit armor set for the main character Edrian, 1,000 Golds, 10 x Super Potion, 1 x EXP Potion, 1 x Revival Feather & 5 x Card Pack...
  • The Adventure Field Story So Far video...
  • The Reveal Trailer video featured on Steam...
  • 9 Pieces of artwork in both PNG & PDF format that include :
  • 6 Wallpapers ( 3 for PC & 3 for Phone ), The Game Logo, The Game Icon & The Game Cover...

This DLC is included in the Deluxe Edition Bundle too...

To find the bonus content, locate the Steam Apps folder, open it and locate the Common folder, open it. Locate the game folder and all this content will be within the Bonus Content folder...

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*
detailed_description:
Adventure Field™ 5 Adventurer Bundle includes :


  • The Adventurer Bundle in-game item that give the player : The exclusive Fancy Suit armor set for the main character Edrian, 1,000 Golds, 10 x Super Potion, 1 x EXP Potion, 1 x Revival Feather & 5 x Card Pack...
  • The Adventure Field Story So Far video...
  • The Reveal Trailer video featured on Steam...
  • 9 Pieces of artwork in both PNG & PDF format that include :
  • 6 Wallpapers ( 3 for PC & 3 for Phone ), The Game Logo, The Game Icon & The Game Cover...

This DLC is included in the Deluxe Edition Bundle too...

To find the bonus content, locate the Steam Apps folder, open it and locate the Common folder, open it. Locate the game folder and all this content will be within the Bonus Content folder...

*If you have any problem installing this DLC uninstall the game and reinstall it at the same time as the DLC, it should fix it.*
legal_notice: This game is the propriety of Wathitdew Record™. All assets used in this game are all handmade, purchased, free or are all ok to be used as stated by their creator from where they been downloaded. All due credits are at the end of the game. Have a great time playing our game!
name: Adventure Field™ 5 Adventurer Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The downloadable content don't need any special configuration...
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The downloadable content don't need any special configuration...
